text:
@JoeBiden The global dominant cure for COVID-19 has remained (Hydroxychloroquine & Zinc With Either Azithromycin or Doxycycline), but classified as unofficial - an unprecedented global conspiracy. 

The wickedness of man to humanity. It is a shame.
